options.title: Metallic red rose
options.description: A visually striking freshwater shrimp species, known for its intense, shimmering red coloration. Its exoskeleton boasts a bold, metallic sheen that can range from deep crimson to bright ruby, reflecting light to create a shiny, almost polished appearance. This glossy red body is smooth and uniform, sometimes with subtle variations in shade, adding depth to its color.
